metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6205 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: It was possible to cause the use of a MessagePort after it had already beenfreed, which could potentially have led to an exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 120, Firefox ESR < 115.5.0, and Thunderbird< 115.5.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
